mapper.sql: id, product_name, amount, pay_type, type, times
mapper.insert: insert into product_info (id, product_name, amount, pay_type, type, times) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler}, #{type,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler} , #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into product_info
id,
product_name,
amount,
pay_type,
type,

mapper.update:
update product_info
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{payType,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},
type = #{type,typeHandler=com.spring.worldwire.extent.NumericEnumHandler},
times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
